The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 08 January is 24,252 (2,807 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 03 January, there were 6,049 new confirmed cases (700.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 December, there were 3,170 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 91% (2,879 extra cases).
